screen_desc: The screenshot displays the welcome screen of the "Life360" app, which is designed to share your location with your family in real-time. The screen features a scenic background with a car driving through a desert landscape, and it prompts users to "Get started" with a purple button. There's also an option to sign in if the user already has an account.
action_think: The user wants to open the Life360 app and it appears that the installation process has already been completed. The next logical step is to click on the 'Get started' button to proceed to the app's main page.
action_plan: Click on the 'Get started' button to initiate the app
action_desc: click on the 'Get started' button located at the middle-bottom of the screen.
action_result: The execution of user request is stopped.
prev_action_result: By clicking on the "Open" button, you have successfully opened the "Life360: Find Family & Friends" app. This action aligns with your user request, as the app is now open and ready for use.
